campaign.objective: Build a high-converting landing page for an AI platform that generates ultra-personalized cold outreach sequences.
campaign.primaryOffer: Start with 20 free AI-powered outreach sequences — no credit card required.

audience.description: SDRs, AEs, and growth teams who rely on outbound but struggle with personalization at scale.
audience.uvp: Automated, research-backed outreach that feels handcrafted — sent at scale.

topBenefits: Spend zero time researching — ColdReach does it for you.
Create multi-email sequences that adapt to buyer behavior.
Ensure messaging consistency across every rep and workflow.
features: AI intent scanner for websites & social profiles
emotionalTriggers: Never send another embarrassing generic email.
Feel confident hitting quota with smarter outreach.
Stop losing deals because of weak first impressions.

objections: Does this integrate with our current sales stack?
testimonials: “ColdReach cut our research time by 90% overnight.” – Growth Lead, Enterprise SaaS

messaging.tone: Bold, confident, outcome-focused — optimized for quota-driven outbound teams.

colorPalette.raw: Primary: Indigo (#6366F1), Accent: Teal (#14B8A6), Background: Charcoal (#111827), Border: Graphite (#374151)

branding.fonts: Headings: Inter ExtraBold; Body: Inter Medium; Accent: JetBrains Mono
branding.layoutPreference: Gradient-dark hero, social-proof highlights, and interactive sequence preview.

faq.question: How accurate is the AI’s research?
faq.answer: ColdReach uses live data extraction and cross-channel verification to ensure relevance.

faq.question: Can we export sequences?
faq.answer: Yes — you can export to HubSpot, Outreach, Apollo, and CSV.

testimonials.quote: Our outbound pipeline finally feels predictable.
testimonials.author: Lena Ortiz

media.consentText: By generating a sequence, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy.

advanced.customPrompt: Highlight speed, accuracy, and quota-driven outcomes.
